name: Old Man Lebon
description:
A short Interactive story where you play an old grander navigating his last days in a long forgotten world, Pulling inspiration from the Themes of Japanese shokunin culture and visual world building masters like Masamune Shirow and Hayao Miyazaki The experience aims to capture and Encapsulate a calm moment of creation and transport the viewer to its bizarre yet hopefully fascinating world of Old Man Lebon.

Or at least attempts :)

Soundtrack by the Great Takashi Kokubo
 

Created at the Bezalel academy of Arts and Design
